basic.description: This course addresses selected topics in warm water reef ecology and focuses on the processes that cause the rapid deterioration of reef ecosystems.  The lectures explain recent results in reef research, including physical,  biogeochemical, and biological process studies. Discussions address initiatives in coral reef protection and management. The course format includes student presentation, readings, and class discussions.
basic.subject: OCB
basic.title: Selected Topics in Coral Reef Ecology
